cont.entity_a: Even at F1.8 with beautifully diffused background. Razor sharp at widest aperture. Very sharp and quick autofocus. Super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization, usable handheld in low light. Sharp and fast lens, suitable for low light with Sony a900 and a700. Faster and sharper than Canon and Nikon in the same focal length.
cont.entity_b: Super fast and tack sharp autofocus. Faster auto-focusing and sharper images. Sharp, nice colors, quick and accurate focus. Sharp and clear photos with great color. Sharp images in low light. Sharp focus with great color.

cont.entity_a: Brilliant color and gorgeously round bokeh. Colors and microcontrast are typical Zeiss. Fast and extremely accurate colors. Bright, crisp, and sharp images.
cont.entity_b: Sharp, nice colors, quick and accurate focus. Sharp and clear photos with great color. Sharp and great color and contrast.

cont.entity_a: Tack sharp with brilliant color and gorgeously round bokeh. Sharp images with amazing bokeh at f/1.8.
Not suitable for walking around. Indicates quality. Best for tripod use due to weight.
cont.entity_b: Drawbacks are cost and weight. Large and heavy compared to kit lens.

cont.entity_a: Super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization, usable handheld in low light. Incredible image quality, even in low light. Sharp and fast lens, suitable for low light with Sony a900 and a700.
cont.entity_b: Super low light performance with image stabilization. Excellent photos even in low light situations. Great for low light with stabilization.

cont.entity_a: Not fast in focus speed, but image quality is top-notch. Very sharp and quick autofocus.
cont.entity_b: Super fast and tack sharp autofocus. Quick and silent autofocus.

cont.entity_a: Not a wide-angle lens, requires physical adjustment for shots.
cont.entity_b: Covers wide angle to mid-range telephoto, perfect for walk-around use. Versatile with a wide focal range. Wide enough for most purposes with some zoom capability. Bulky but versatile with constant aperture. Covers a versatile zoom range.

cont.entity_a: Ideal for portrait work and astrophotography. Favorite lens for portraits, low-light, and action shots.
cont.entity_b: Great for landscapes and candid photos. Great for portraits with sharp focus.
Not weather sealed but offers good quality.

cont.entity_a: Considered superior to the Sony 85mm lens. Regarded as the best lens Sony makes.

cont.entity_b: Loud image stabilizer due to older system.
